messages.message: Hi team, I'm trying to demo Human Review and I'm creating a validation rule for field confidence. In build the field is showing a field confidence in the 40%. I set the validation rule to 99% confidence and the rule fails in build. When I run the deployment the validation rule is not triggered. I understand that the confidence level is probabilistic but I'm unable to troubleshoot this because the field confidence is not shown in the deployment run.
can you link your deployment run?
i inspected the results for this deployment run, and i see >99% confidence for `Statement start date`
i see that the provenance and value are different for `Statement start date` on this doc in Build (ss1) vs deployment run (ss2)

@Nikolaos Kofinas do you know why we would get the field value from a different place in the same doc in Build vs an app run? is this just another occurrence of https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-2900?
Thanks so much for looking into this. I was just about to ask if itâ€™s expected that the provenance could be different between build and deploy. Interested to see what Nikolaos says.
yes just an occurrance of the same inconsistency
